title: How does rank teams work now?
body:
I know in solo queue you can add 5 people but you can still make a ranked team? So how do I make it so I dont use my solo queue rating? I am confused :/ 
Help me to understand how to use rank queue mmr system instead!

Regards,
Pokemon Blue

replies.body:
Hey man

As of Season 6, **Riot** has reworked the old ranked teams system into the new dynamic queue. Even though dynamic queue has already been launched; there's still some work to be done to implement the full team experience into this queue.

So to answer your question, the old ranked queue (the one where you _"don't use solo queue rating"_) has been removed from the game. It's slowly being re-integrated into dynamic queue.

You can learn more about all of this [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback).
